automation_yaml:
id: 'office_wled_living_room_time_routine'
alias: Office WLED and Living Room Time Routine
description: "Time-based Office WLED and living room routine exactly matching your schedule. Living room actions are TODO placeholders."
mode: single
trigger:
  - platform: time_pattern
    minutes: "/1"
  - platform: homeassistant
    event: start
conditions: []
action:
  - choose:
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "06:00:00"
            before: "09:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 50
              rgb_color: [255, 180, 110]
          # TODO: Turn OFF all living room lights here, e.g.:
          # - service: light.turn_off
          #   target:
          #     entity_id:
          #       - light.living_room_main
          #       - light.living_room_lamp
          - delay: "00:00:05"
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "17:00:00"
            before: "20:00:00"
        sequence:
          # TODO: Turn ON all living room lights to 80% brightness here, e.g.:
          # - service: light.turn_on
          #   target:
          #     entity_id:
          #       - light.living_room_main
          #       - light.living_room_lamp
          #   data:
          #     brightness_pct: 80
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 100
              rgb_color: [200, 230, 255]
          - delay: "00:00:05"
      - conditions:
          - condition: time
            after: "21:00:00"
        sequence:
          - service: light.turn_on
            target:
              entity_id: light.wled
            data:
              brightness_pct: 20
              rgb_color: [255, 180, 110]
          # TODO: Turn OFF all living room lights here, e.g.:
          # - service: light.turn_off
          #   target:
          #     entity_id:
          #       - light.living_room_main
          #       - light.living_room_lamp
          - delay: "00:00:05"
    default: []
